Skill.Name: Swords
Skill.Description: This skill governs fighting with various types of medium to large bladed weapons.

Skill.Name: Daggers
Skill.Description: This skill governs fighting with various types of small bladed weapons such as daggers and knives.

Skill.Name: Axes
Skill.Description: This skill governs fighting with various types of axes. Axe fighting involves more skill than most people think.

Skill.Name: Polearms
Skill.Description: This skill governs combat ability with spears, staves, lances, halberds and poleaxes.

Skill.Name: Blunt
Skill.Description: This skill governs fighting with various types of blunt weapons such as clubs, maces and hammers.

Skill.Name: Bows
Skill.Description: This skill governs fighting with various types of bows.

Skill.Name: Crossbows
Skill.Description: This skill governs fighting with various types of crossbows.

Skill.Name: Thrown
Skill.Description: This skill governs fighting with thowing knives, axes, stars, darts, rocks and slings.

Skill.Name: Hand to Hand
Skill.Description: This skill governs fighting using various forms of hand to hand combat such as boxing and martial arts.

Skill.Name: Shield
Skill.Description: This skill governs usage of shields, primarily as defensive items.

Skill.Name: Running
Skill.Description: This skill governs a characters running and jogging ability.

Skill.Name: Climbing
Skill.Description: This skill governs the climbing ability of a character.

Skill.Name: Swimming
Skill.Description: This skill governs the swimming ability of a character.

Skill.Name: Jump
Skill.Description: This skill governs the ability to jump by a character.

Skill.Name: Ambidexterity
Skill.Description: This skill governs the ability to use both hands, and allows a character to fight with a weapon in each hand.

Skill.Name: Dodge
Skill.Description: This skill governs the ability to evade danger by a character, either in combat or from damage from falling rocks or other traps.

Skill.Name: Deflect
Skill.Description: This skill governs the ability of a character to deflect or parry attacks against them.

Skill.Name: Traps
Skill.Description: This skill allows a character with the proper tools to detect, disable and or remove traps.

Skill.Name: Pick Lock
Skill.Description: This skill lets a character with the proper tools open locked doors and chests.

Skill.Name: Sneak
Skill.Description: This skill lets a character remain hidden from enemies, including hiding in shadows and moving silently. It also allows sneak attacks in combat.

Skill.Name: Pick Pocket
Skill.Description: Stealing is wrong. But sometimes people have stuff that you want or need. This skill allows a character to pilfer or take items without another character detecting the act.

Skill.Name: Perform
Skill.Description: This skill allows a bard to use bardic songs and inspirations as well as bard-only instruments and artifacts.

Skill.Name: Death Strike
Skill.Description: This skill gives a small chance to inflict instant kills on enemies during combat.

Skill.Name: History
Skill.Description: This skill reflects a characters knowledge of civilizations, races and history.

Skill.Name: Mythology
Skill.Description: This skill reflects a characters knowledge of animals, beasts and monsters.

Skill.Name: Artifacts
Skill.Description: This skill reflects a charcters knowledge of rare items and magical artifacts. It helps characters assay unknown items and properly use dangerous magical artifacts.

Skill.Name: Diplomacy
Skill.Description: This skill is a characters ability to befriend, persuade, bluff or intimidate someone.

Skill.Name: Bartering
Skill.Description: This skill reflects a characters knowledge of the true worth of items and how to get the best price during a deal.

Skill.Name: Scouting
Skill.Description: This skill allows a character to follow to discover things that others characters cannot. Applications include finding trails and discovering secrets.

Skill.Name: Alchemy
Skill.Description: This crafting skill for allows working with herbs and ingredients, and creating salves and potions.

Skill.Name: Enchanting
Skill.Description: This crafting skill lets a character create magical items, arms and armour.

Skill.Name: Smithing
Skill.Description: This crafting skill lets a character forge arms and armour.

Skill.Name: Arcane
Skill.Description: This is the main magic skill for mages and warlocks. The skill points a character has, the more effective their arcane spells are.

Skill.Name: Holy
Skill.Description: This is the main magic skill for priests and necromancers. The skill points a character has, the more effective their divine spells are.

Skill.Name: Nature
Skill.Description: This is the main magic skill for druids. The skill points a character has, the more effective their nature spells are.

Skill.Name: Mind
Skill.Description: This is the main magic skill for psionics. The skill points a character has, the more effective their psionic spells are.

Skill.Name: Fire School
Skill.Description: This is the skill for spells from the elemental school of fire and energy.

Skill.Name: Water School
Skill.Description: This is the skill for spells from the elemental school of water and ice.

Skill.Name: Earth School
Skill.Description: This is the skill for spells from the elemental school of earth and acid.

Skill.Name: Air School
Skill.Description: This is the skill for spells from the elemental school of air and lightning.

Skill.Name: Mental School
Skill.Description: This is the skill for spells from the mental school of enchantment, illusion and mental domination.

Skill.Name: Divine School
Skill.Description: This is the skill for spells from the magic school for non-elemental based spells.
